data.trans_hint: Vần đề có thể được giải quyết mà không gặp quá nhiều khó khăn.
data.en_hint: The problem can be got over without too much difficulty.
data.content_game_1: The problem can be Got over without too much difficulty.
data.answer_en_hint: The problem can be Got over without too much difficulty.

data.trans_hint: Quả bom được hẹn phét nổ lúc 12 giờ.
data.en_hint: The bomb was timed to go off at 12 o'clock.
data.content_game_1: The bomb was timed to go off at 12 o'clock.
data.answer_en_hint: The bomb was timed to go off at 12 o'clock.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang ở gần đấy, vì vậy hãy để tôi mang qua cho bạn vài quyển sách mà bạn mượn tôi hôm trước.
data.en_hint: I'll be in the neighborhood, so let me drop off the books you borrowed me the other day.
data.content_game_1: I'll be in the neighborhood, so let me drop off the books you borrowed me the other day.
data.answer_en_hint: I'll be in the neighborhood, so let me drop off the books you borrowed me the other day.

data.trans: Làm ai đó cảm thấy buồn
data.trans_hint: Việc anh ấy không gọi điện khiến tôi cảm thấy buồn.
data.en_hint: That he didn't call got me down.
data.content_game_1: That he didn't call got me down.
data.answer_en_hint: That he didn't call got me down.

data.trans: Đánh trả/ tấn công lại ai đó
data.trans_hint: Cô ta đã cố gắng làm tổn thương tôi bằng cách nói rằng tôi là một đứa trẻ không cha nhưng tôi đã tấn công lại cô ta và khiến cô ta khóc.
data.en_hint: She tried to hurt me by saying that I'm a fatherless child, but I hit back at her and made her cry.
data.content_game_1: She tried to hurt me by saying that I'm a fatherless child, but I hit back at her and made her cry.
data.answer_en_hint: She tried to hurt me by saying that I'm a fatherless child, but I hit back at her and made her cry.

data.trans_hint: Đừng bao giờ cố hạ thấp ai đó trước mặt người khác vì khi đó chính bạn sẽ trông thật ngớ ngẩn.
data.en_hint: Never try to put someone down in front of other people because then it will be you who look silly.
data.content_game_1: Never try to put someone down in front of other people because then it will be you who look silly.
data.answer_en_hint: Never try to put someone down in front of other people because then it will be you who look silly.

data.trans_hint: Thấy được nhiều tiềm năng ở thị trường mới, tôi sẽ đề xuất một cái dự án để thâm nhập vào nó.
data.en_hint: Seeing the potentials in the new market, I will put forward a plan to get into it.
data.content_game_1: Seeing the potentials in the new market, I will put forward a plan to get into it.
data.answer_en_hint: Seeing the potentials in the new market, I will put forward a plan to get into it.

data.trans: Bắt chước ai đó (một cách hài hước)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi không thể nhịn được cười khi thấy Jack bắt chước ông Bing.
data.en_hint: We can't stop laughing seeing Jack take Mr. Bing off.
data.content_game_1: We can't stop laughing seeing Jack take Mr. Bing off.
data.answer_en_hint: We can't stop laughing seeing Jack take Mr. Bing off.

data.trans_hint: Tôi buồn chán quá - Bạn có thể nghĩ ra thứ gì đó để chúng ta giải trí không?
data.en_hint: I'm bored - can you think up something for us to entertain?
data.content_game_1: I'm bored - can you think up something for us to entertain?
data.answer_en_hint: I'm bored - can you think up something for us to entertain?

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã nhận được một lời mời làm việc tại công ty mà tôi đã phỏng vấn tuần trước, nhưng tôi đã từ chối.
data.en_hint: I got a job offer at the company that I had an interview with last week, but I turned it down.
data.content_game_1: I got a job offer at the company that I had an interview with last week, but I turned it down.
data.answer_en_hint: I got a job offer at the company that I had an interview with last week, but I turned it down.
